Segment.name: LN2
Segment.comment: To provide specific information about a real estate loan

Field.name: LienPriorityCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the rights and relationship of a loan to any other loan secured by the same property

Field.name: RealEstateLoanTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the loan product category

Field.name: FrequencyCode
Field.comment: Code indicating frequency or type of activities or actions being reported

Field.name: LoanPaymentTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the nature of loan payment

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: AssumptionTermsCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the terms for loan assumption

Field.name: ReferenceIdentifier
Field.comment: To identify one or more reference numbers or identification numbers as specified by the Reference Qualifier

Field.name: QuantityQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of quantity
